fullText: This faithful adaptation of Khaled Hosseini's beloved novel brings emotional weight to the stage, though it occasionally feels constrained by its reverence for the source material.
dtliExcerpt: This faithful adaptation of Khaled Hosseini's beloved novel brings emotional weight to the stage, though it occasionally feels constrained by its reverence for the source material.
